trans-unit.target: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTGUIDE_00507_INV00463_000_000<tab>Our preliminary survey of Pagos has confirmed what we long suspected: the very aether of creatures indigenous to Eureka is in constant flux!

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTGUIDE_00507_INV00463_000_001<tab>The underlying cause of this remains unclear, but of greater concern is the possibility that the beasts you encounter may abruptly transform into far more monstrous forms. Be on your guard!
